docs.lead_paragraph: Responding on Facebook, readers who either live or have spent time in South Korea shared their experiences of the hospitals there.

headline.main: Amid MERS Outbreak, Readers Reflect on South Korean Hospitals

docs.snippet: Responding on Facebook, readers who either live or have spent time in South Korea shared their experiences of the hospitals there.

docs.lead_paragraph: ​ The risk to the public is low, the C.D.C. said Monday, although the patient, who traveled from India in April, has been hospitalized in Maryland with a drug-resistant form of the disease.

headline.main: Tuberculosis Case Prompts Search for Patient’s Fellow Airline Passengers
headline.print_headline: Officials Trace Path of Passenger With TB

docs.abstract: Woman is diagnosed with XDR-TB, drug-resistant strain of tuberculosis, after traveling to India; Centers for Disease Control and Prevention seek to identify people who may have come into contact with her in weeks between her return to country and hospitalization.
docs.snippet: ​ The risk to the public is low, the C.D.C. said Monday, although the patient, who traveled from India in April, has been hospitalized in Maryland with a drug-resistant form of the disease.

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations

docs.lead_paragraph: Lyme disease makes the headlines but there are plenty of additional reasons to avoid tick bites. New research highlights the latest in a growing list of tick-borne threats — a distant relative of Lyme that's easy to confuse with other illnesses.

headline.main: Beyond Lyme, New Illnesses, More Reason to Watch for Ticks
headline.print_headline: Beyond Lyme, New Illnesses, More Reason to Watch for Ticks
